author: COMSOL
description: This example simulates the mixing of particles in a rotating micromixer. The mixer contains 3 distinct inlets and an outlet. The Rotating Machinery interface is used to model the fluid flow and the Particle Tracing for Fluid Flow interface is used to compute the particle trajectories.
label: micromixer_particle_tracing.mph
name: root
